WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to perform a selection within a currently selected set of features
WidgetInfo.Label: Select within
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to select features within this selection

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: If this is a TaskPane widget, this widget will set a URL in the TaskPane to gather user input, otherwise it looks for an HTML element with this name, otherwise it will open a popup window to gather user input.

Parameter.Name: DisableIfSelectionEmpty
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if this widget should only be enabled if there is a selection available on the map
Parameter.Label: Disable If Selection Empty
